section:
The Ruby River is aptly named. Its waters are tinged with crimson. Some say it is the rusty minerals of the Grumes, others that it is the blood of the elder gods (though this is a heresy in Uttaku!). There is a bridge across the river here.
Follow the river north Head east into Old Harkuna Go south to the Hall of Heroes Head west to the Crags of the Long Homes Head south-west into Uttaku
